title: Terminal Design

**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003536/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Foundries](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003536/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Foundries) : Terminal Design**

Terminal Design is the Brooklyn-based type studio of American type designer, [James Montalbano](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003536/http:/typophile.com/wiki/James%20Montalbano). Terminal Design has gotten a lot of press for their highway signage font system, [Clearview Hwy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150205003536/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Clearview%20Hwy).
